entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
The eighth entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars 2 Heart of Thorns.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

optionalfeature.name: Heat Sync
entries: {@b Properties:} Fire, Grants Might, Grants Fury, Spreads Boons
{@b Description:} Give might and fury to yourself, then spread boons you have to allies.

optionalfeature.name: Wildfire
entries: {@b Description:} Release a fiery torrent that burns enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Tidal Surge
entries: {@b Description:} Send out a tidal wave that regenerates and heals allies, then knocks enemies back.

optionalfeature.name: Water Globe
entries: {@b Description:} Blast out a watery orb that heals allies as it travels.

optionalfeature.name: Cyclone
entries: {@b Description:} Blast out a cyclone that pulls enemies toward its location and grants swiftness to allies it affects.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Orb
entries: {@b Description:} Launch an orb of lightning that fires projectiles at nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Sand Squall
entries: {@b Properties:} Earth, Grants Protection, Extends Boon Duration, Magnetic Aura
{@b Description:} Apply protection to you and your allies, then increase the duration of all boons currently existing on you and your allies. Gain magnetic aura.

optionalfeature.name: Dust Storm
entries: {@b Properties:} Earth, Grants Boons, Inflicts Conditions
{@b Description:} Grant boons to nearby allies and summon a dust storm that inflicts conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Positive Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Smack your hammer into your foe while empowering yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Negative Bash

prerequisite.other: Requires Hammer. Must follow Positive Strike.

entries: {@b Description:} Slam your hammer into your foe to leave them vulnerable.

optionalfeature.name: Equalizing Blow

prerequisite.other: Requires Hammer. Must follow Negative Bash.

entries: {@b Description:} Bring down your hammer on your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Electro-whirl
entries: {@b Description:} Spin around, reflecting missiles and hitting enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Charge
entries: {@b Description:} Dash forward with a rocket-charged hammer to damage enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Shock Shield
entries: {@b Description:} Block attacks while striking foes in front of you, gaining barrier with each enemy you hit.

optionalfeature.name: Thunderclap
entries: {@b Description:} Ionize an area, bringing down the power of lightning to stun foes and damage them over its duration.

optionalfeature.name: "Wash the Pain Away!"
entries: {@b Description:} Shouts. Mists billow from you, healing allies in range and cleansing conditions.

optionalfeature.name: "Feel the Burn!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Damage, Grants Fire Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Heat waves blast out from the player, causing damage and granting fire aura to allies.

optionalfeature.name: "Eye of the Storm!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Grants Superspeed, Breaks Stun
{@b Description:} Shout. Imbue your voice with the element of air, massively increasing speed and breaking stun for nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: "Aftershock!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Inflicts Cripple, Immobilize, Grants Magnetic Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Call upon the earth to cripple and immobilize foes in the area around you. Allies in the initial blast gain a magnetic aura.

optionalfeature.name: "Flash-Freeze!"
entries: {@b Properties:} Shout, Inflicts Chill, Grants Frost Aura
{@b Description:} Shout. Unleash a torrent of ice on enemy locations, chilling those who cannot escape. Grant frost aura to allies in range.

optionalfeature.name: "Rebound!"
entries: {@b Description:} Shout and infuse your allies with arcane energy. Allies who would take lethal damage while this is active ignore the deathblow and are healed instead. If the effect expires naturally, grant an aura based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Medic Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a medic gyro to heal yourself and nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Reconstruction Field

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Medic Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Establish a defensive field, granting protection to allies in its area.

optionalfeature.name: Blast Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash a blast gyro to begin a countdown to a tremendous blast.

optionalfeature.name: Bypass Coating

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Blast Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Splash a hypercoating on nearby allies, granting superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Bulwark Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a bulwark gyro to grant barrier to allies in the area.

optionalfeature.name: Defense Field

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Bulwark Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Project a defensive dome around yourself and grant stability to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Purge Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a purge gyro to remove conditions from you and your nearby allies.

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Purge Gyro

optionalfeature.name: Shredder Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a shredder gyro to attack foes near you and repeatedly use whirl finishers.

optionalfeature.name: Spare Capacitor

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Shredder Gyro

entries: {@b Description:} Set down a lightning capacitor to daze and damage foes near it.

optionalfeature.name: Sneak Gyro
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a sneak gyro to provide stealth to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Might, Inflicts Burn

{@b Description:} Overload. Unleash your flames, granting might to allies and burning enemies. Finishing the cast creates a tornado that continues to grant might and burn foes. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Water
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Heal, Cures Conditions, Grants Regeneration

{@b Description:} Overload. Create a surge of accumulated water magic, healing and cleansing allies. When the cast ends, heal the area and apply regeneration. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Electricity Aura, Inflicts Stun

{@b Description:} Overload. Use your air magic to summon a nimbus that repeatedly strikes nearby enemies. When this ability is complete, imbue your allies with electricity and create a lingering static region that strikes enemies at the same interval. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Overload Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Overload, Grants Protection, Inflicts Cripple

{@b Description:} Overload. Ride your stored earth magic around, granting protection to other allies you move over and crippling enemies, then deliver a final immobilizing blast of power to the area, leaving behind a dust cyclone that delivers the same effects as the overload. Using this skill causes the attunement to have a longer recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Singularity

prerequisite.other: Access to the Tempest Elite Specialization.

entries: Attain elemental singularity by remaining in an attunement for a period of time. Upon attaining singularity, you may overload the attunement to your vicinity. Gain access to Shouts.

optionalfeature.name: Gale Song
entries: Grant protection to nearby allies when you use a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Latent Stamina
entries: Grant vigor to nearby allies when attuning to water. Restore endurance to allies you grant vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Unstable Conduit
entries: Overloads grant an aura based on your attunement.

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Gale Song|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Latent Stamina|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Unstable Conduit|GW2HoT}

optionalfeature.name: Tempestuous Aria
entries: Using a shout grants allies might. Granting an aura to an ally increases your outgoing damage for a period of time.

optionalfeature.name: Harmonious Conduit
entries: Gain stability and swiftness when starting an overload.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorating Torrents
entries: Auras you grant also grant regeneration and vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Hardy Conduit

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Tempestuous Aria|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Harmonious Conduit|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Invigorating Torrents|GW2HoT}

entries: Overloads grant protection to nearby allies. Protection gains increased damage reduction.

optionalfeature.name: Transcendent Tempest
entries: Time to attain singularity is reduced. Upon successfully completing an overload, gain increased damage.

optionalfeature.name: Lucid Singularity
entries: Apply boons to nearby allies while channeling and when successfully completing a channel.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Bastion
entries: Heal allies you grant an aura to. Grant frost aura to nearby allies when struck while below the health threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Function Gyro

prerequisite.other: Access to the Scrapper Elite Specialization.

entries: You gain access to the function gyro, which replaces your tool belt skill 5. Gain access to Gyro skills.

optionalfeature.name: Gyroscopic Acceleration
entries: Well abilities have an increased area of effect and grant superspeed to nearby allies on their first pulse. Your function gyro also grants superspeed to allies when cast.

optionalfeature.name: System Shocker
entries: Disabling a foe grants barrier to nearby allies. Your function gyro dazes foes when cast. Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Mass Momentum
entries: Gain might while you have stability. Your Function Gyro applies stability to allies when cast.

optionalfeature.name: Speed of Synergy

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Gyroscopic Acceleration|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature System Shocker|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Mass Momentum|GW2HoT}

entries: Using a heal skill grants superspeed in a radius around you. Using a healing skill's associated tool-belt skill grants you personal superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Rapid Regeneration
entries: Regenerate health while affected by swiftness or superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Expert Examination
entries: Your function gyro grants protection to allies when cast. Using a healing skill's associated toolbelt grants protection to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Object in Motion
entries: Deal increased strike damage while you have stability, swiftness, or superspeed. This damage increase compounds for each boon you have.

optionalfeature.name: Impact Savant

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Rapid Regeneration|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Expert Examination|GW2HoT} or {@optfeature Object in Motion|GW2HoT}

entries: A percentage of the strike damage you deal is converted into barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Ex Machina
entries: Function gyro has additional charges, no longer has a recharge penalty, and grants barrier to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Kinetic Accelerators
entries: Grant boons to nearby allies when you successfully combo a field with a blast, leap, or whirl finisher. Your function gyro is now a blast finisher. Whirl finishers can only trigger this trait once per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Applied Force
entries: Gain stability when you gain might at or above the threshold. Might grants bonus power.
